name: TLPL471
title: Curriculum, Teaching, and Assessment in Secondary Social Studies
description: Prerequisite: TLPL470. Corequisite: EDCI428. Restriction: Must be in Secondary Educ: Social Studies program; and minimum cumulative GPA of 2.75. Or permission of EDUC-Center for Learning & Educational Technology. Credit only granted for: EDCI427 or TLPL471. Formerly: EDCI427. An exploration of curriculum development, teaching, and assessment in secondary history/social studies. Focus on identifying students' conceptions of social studies topics and designing lessons that advance students' disciplinary thinking and understanding.
